name: Bike Master 3D. Super Rider Driving In Motor Baron World 2016 Racing
name_original: Bike Master 3D. Super Rider Driving In Motor Baron World 2016 Racing
description:
Experience extreme trial Bike Racing with Bike Master. Be the most intense, competitive and quickest rider in order to get the 3 stars on all the levels while enjoying the amazing bike physics and fast-paced game play. Ride through obstacles in the most spectacular environment built just for performing the craziest tricks.
Your goal in this extreme racing game is to successfully complete several stunt levels, consisting of challenging and dangerous tricky path.

Try to find the right balance between power and grip while staying in your class. Filled with killer tricks, extreme freestyle action and insane stunts, Bike racing is a high thrill trial bike riding adventure.

- Many defying levels
- Many bikes with different physics for a great game play experience
- Amazing realistic physics
- 10 upgrades
- 15 levels

How to Play:
Tap your iPhone/iPad on right side to race / brake / reverse.
Tap on left to control balance.
